turns.content: name a software platform for obesity consultants

One software platform for obesity consultants is "Obesity Algorithm®" developed by the Obesity Medicine Association. This platform provides evidence-based guidelines for the assessment, management, and treatment of obesity, as well as tools and resources to help healthcare professionals develop personalized treatment plans for their patients. It includes a comprehensive algorithm that guides clinicians through the decision-making process for obesity treatment, along with patient handouts, calculators, and
